sentence.Network_en: It must be nearly six; soon would be reveille and the end of the night's rest.
sentence.Network_cn: 应该快6点了；很快就要到吹起床号的时间，夜间休息就快结束了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: culminate的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... aforesaid 上述的, 前述的 ... reveille 起床号, 晨号, 晨号列队.
apnea的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... environs 市郊, 郊外... reveille 起床号, 晨号, 晨号列队... superstition 迷信.
军号（Reveille），布莱登（Bladen），奥尼尔（O′Neal），薄雾（Misty），佛罗里达蓝（Flordablue），海滨（Gulfcoast），夏普 …

RelatedPhrase.word: Tu te reveilles tout contre moi

list.key: Tu te reveilles tout contre moi
list.abs: Tu vis comme dans mon reve 你生活着就好象在我的梦中 Tu te reveilles tout contre moi 你紧挨着我醒来了 Chaque jour qui se leve 每天起床的时候 Me.
Far away he could hear trumpeters sounding reveille ., 他可以听到远处号兵在吹起床号.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French réveillez! 'wake up!', imperative plural of réveiller, based on Latin vigilare 'keep watch'

entry.def: Reveille is the time when soldiers have to get up in the morning.

example.ex: It must be nearly six; soon would be reveille and the end of the night's rest.
example.tran: 应该快6点了;很快就要到吹起床号的时间，夜间休息就快结束了。

means.word_mean: 2. a signal to get up in the morning; in the military it is a bugle call at sunrise

auth_sentence.content: He...warbled a melodious reveille to his love still asleep.
auth_sentence.res_content: He...warbled a melodious reveille to his love still asleep.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He...warbled a melodious reveille to his love still asleep.

auth_sentence.content: Any man caught in his bunk after reveille.
auth_sentence.res_content: Any man caught in his bunk after reveille.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Any man caught in his bunk after reveille.
